summary: The Belgium national football team, known as the Red Devils, has been playing internationally since 1904. They are governed by the Royal Belgian Football Association and play most home games at King Baudouin Stadium. Belgium has competed in the World Cup, European Championships, and the Olympics, winning the 1920 Olympics. They've had several successful periods, finishing third in UEFA Euro 1972, runners-up in UEFA Euro 1980, and fourth in the 1986 World Cup. Recently, they topped the FIFA rankings in 2015 and finished third in the 2018 World Cup. They have rivalries with the Netherlands and France.
title: Belgium national football team
